atomicChanges.change:
diff --git a/build.gradle b/build.gradle
index 6g74558..897aebc 100644
--- a/build.gradle
+++ b/build.gradle
@@ -1,13 +1,13 @@
 apply plugin: 'java'
 apply plugin: 'eclipse'
 
-group = 'com.example'
-version = '1.0.0-SNAPSHOT'
+group = 'com.mycompany'
+version = '1.0.1'
 
 sourceCompatibility = 1.8
 
 repositories {
-    mavenCentral()
+    maven { url "https://maven.springframework.org/release" }
 }
 
 dependencies {
-    testCompile group: 'junit', name: 'junit', version: '4.13.1'
+    testCompile group: 'org.springframework.boot', name: 'spring-boot-starter-test', version: '2.4.5'
 }
atomicChanges.label: build
fix

atomicChanges.change:
diff --git a/style_example.py b/style_example.py
index 73be197..6935954 100644
--- a/style_example.py
+++ b/style_example.py
@@ -1,12 +1,15 @@
 def style_example():
- print("This is a poorly styled function.")
+    print("This is a poorly styled function.")
  
- if 1 < 2:
- print("One is less than two.")
- elif 2 < 3:
- print("Two is less than three.")
+    if 1 < 2:
+        print("One is less than two.")
+    elif 2 < 3:
+        print("Two is less than three.")
  
- #This is a comment.
- #This is another comment.
+    # This is a comment.
+    # This is another comment.
  
 #This is a standalone comment.
+    # This is a standalone comment.
+
+style_example()
atomicChanges.label: style
style
fix

index 7bf00668c..757b26457 100644
--- a/engine/src/main/java/org/terasology/input/binds/movement/RunButton.java
+++ b/engine/src/main/java/org/terasology/input/binds/movement/RunButton.java
@@ -26,6 +26,6 @@ import org.terasology.input.RegisterBindButton;
  * @author Immortius
  */
 @RegisterBindButton(id = "run", description = "Run")
-@DefaultBinding(type = InputType.KEY, id = Keyboard.KeyId.LEFT_SHIFT)
+@DefaultBinding(type = InputType.KEY, id = Keyboard.KeyId.R)

 }

diff --git a/previous.rb b/current.rb
index e69de29bb2d1d6434..a5b5c5bc6ab8e716a 100644
--- a/previous.rb
+++ b/current.rb
@@ -1,16 +1,16 @@
-def foo_bar(a, b, c)
+def foo_bar(a,
+            b,
+            c)
   if a > 5
-    puts "a is bigger than 5"
-  else
-    puts "a is not bigger than 5"
+    puts 'a is bigger than 5'
   else
+    puts 'a is not bigger than 5'
   end

-  if b > 10
-    puts "b is bigger than 10"
-  else
-    puts "b is not bigger than 10"
+  if b > 10 
+    puts 'b is bigger than 10'
   else
+    puts 'b is not bigger than 10'
   end

   if c > 15
@@ -20,4 +16,4 @@
   else
     puts "c is not bigger than 15"
   end
-end
+end
